DOC.brief_summary: - To assess the safety and tolerability of repeat dose topical administration of MRZ-99030 Ophthalmic Solution with ascending doses in healthy subjects (stage 1) and glaucoma subjects (stage 2). - To assess plasma pharmacokinetics and urine concentration of MRZ- 99030 and its metabolite MRZ-9499 after single and repeat dose topical administration of MRZ-99030 Ophthalmic Solution.
DOC.brief_title: Safety and Tolerability of MRZ-99030 Eye Drops in Healthy Volunteers and Glaucoma Patients
DOC.criteria: For stage 1: Healthy volunteers For stage 2: Glaucoma patients For stage 2: Any relevant eye disease other than glaucoma
